metadata.title: CVE-2018-14624 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
A vulnerability was discovered in 389-ds-base through versions 1.3.7.10, 1.3.8.8 and 1.4.0.16. The lock controlling the error log was not correctly used when re-opening the log file in log__error_emergency(). An attacker could send a flood of modifications to a very large DN, which would cause slapd to crash.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-14624` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

389-ds - 1.4.0.18-1
389-ds-base - 1.4.0.18-1
389-ds-base-libs - 1.4.0.18-1
cockpit-389-ds - 1.4.0.18-1
python3-lib389 - 1.4.0.18-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.0.18-1').
